title: Ventveau
content:
this is the start to my first typeface. i created it combining the straight lines and spaces of vents with the organic shapes of art nouveau. what works? what doesn't work?


ventveau (399.2 k)
author: kelly_g

comments.content:
The _sample_ doesn't work - I can't see it. :-(   
   
hhp

I think I've got it now. . .   
   
 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023194033im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/29/9264.gif)

This reminds me of those huge platform boots!   
   
Some of the letters (like the "B") show a lot of promise - they can lead the rest to a nice complete whole. But I don't like those "vents".   
   
hhp

Hrant,   
   
so do you think that I should remove the vents?   
I like the B also, I guess that my favorite letters are those with counters. I had a tough time unifying the letters that have counters with the letters without. do you have any suggestions?   
   
kelly
